results.description: Barnsley sign Leeds United left-back Clarke Oduor and Austrian striker Patrick Schmidt, both on four-year contracts.

results.description: Celtic complete the signing of Belgian left-back Boli Bolingoli-Mbombo from Rapid Vienna as the 24-year-old signs a four-year contract.
results.title: Boli Bolingoli-Mbombo: Celtic sign Rapid Vienna left-back

results.description: Manchester City sign Nigeria international Olarenwaju Kayode from Austria Vienna and send him on a season-long loan to Girona.

results.description: Striker Klaas Jan Huntelaar signs a two-year contract extension with Schalke, ending rumours about a Premier League switch.
results.title: Klaas Jan Huntelaar: Arsenal & Liverpool target signs Schalke deal
